backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining Project and ContactInfo types with three project category maps (marketing, web dev, social media) and CRUD functions for adding projects and managing contact information.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three completed features: updating Hero background image, implementing color theme harmonization with image palette, and rendering the uploaded photo as a static asset.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON summary of frontend files describing the steel blue/burgundy/dusty pink color scheme implementation across components, hooks for backend queries, and portfolio layout structure.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining CSS custom properties for light and dark mode color tokens using OKLCH color space with neutral backgrounds and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with UTF-8 charset, viewport meta tag, page title "Thanisha Ivana Portfolio", and root div mounting the React app from main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component orchestrating the portfolio layout with Hero, Skills, three PortfolioSection instances (marketing, social media, web dev), ContactSection, and Footer components using custom hooks for data fetching.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact section component displaying name, email, phone, and LinkedIn in a card grid with icons, loading states, and hover effects using steel blue glow styling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying copyright for Thanisha Ivana Portfolio with heart icon and caffeine.ai attribution link including UTM tracking parameters.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Full-screen hero section with uploaded personal photo background, burgundy gradient overlays, main heading with burgundy glow effect, tagline, CTA buttons with burgundy shadows, and smooth scroll navigation.
frontend/src/components/PortfolioSection: Reusable portfolio section component that displays a grid of project cards with title, description, and external links, including loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/SkillsSection.ts: Static skills section component displaying six marketing competencies (Strategy, Content Creation, Social Media, Analytics, Campaign Management, Growth Marketing) in a responsive grid with icons.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that manages the backend actor instance, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity state, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching marketing projects, social media projects, web dev projects, and contact info from the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color variables defining a dark charcoal theme with burgundy primary, steel blue secondary, and dusty pink accent colors for both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the theme with custom OKLCH color system (burgundy, steel, dusty palettes), custom fonts (Playfair Display, Inter), animations, and box shadow utilities.
project_state.json: Project state tracking for Thanisha Ivana's digital marketing portfolio website with purple/black theme and personal photo background. Includes architectural notes, existing features (hero section, portfolio sections, contact area), and recent feature requests for color scheme updates and image integration.
